aka: El ultimo canto del pajaro Cu

cast.name: 泰诺克·乌尔塔 Tenoch Huerta

writer.name: 阿隆索·帕拉西奥斯 Alonso Ruizpalacios

director.name: 阿隆索·帕拉西奥斯 Alonso Ruizpalacios

this_title: El último canto del pájaro Cú
trans_title: El ultimo canto del pajaro Cu
introduction: Minutes before dying in the general ward of an urban hospital, Ulises, a terminally ill patient in his fifties, goes over fragments of his life.Lauro, a neighboring patient, young and smiling, is his only companion in his final agony, in which he relives all the opportunities he let pass. Thus, as he crosses the border to death, he realizes that this is the most exciting moment of his life.
chinese_title: El último canto del pájaro Cú
